description:
Two guitars: Lead and Rhythm (surprise, surprise).
Added Piano and Synth during ambient break. (just so it isn't silent for 17 measures)
Overall more refined tab.
Solo corrected. (Amity's first solo!)

Big thanks to AskingSierra for the previous tab. It was a helpful guideline.

This can be played in C# Standard if you wish. There's no 0 chugs, and the lowest note used is a C#.

Feel free to add Bass and Drums.
title: I Bring The Weather With Me
